body_html:
@jbarker-nvidia No worries! Sorry, I wasn't sure if you were coming back so I rebased your code and addressed some of the comments at the same time. My branch is here: please feel free to pull from it.

Yes, the code is close to being ready to merge! There are a few changes I'd like to see (let me know if you don't want to continue with this, I can also make the changes if you don't have the bandwidth). They are as follows:

  • Figure out the contiguous things I mentioned above in the review
  • Add the documentation for fold
  • Add module tests

body:
@jbarker-nvidia No worries! Sorry, I wasn't sure if you were coming back so I rebased your code and addressed some of the comments at the same time. My branch is [here](https://github.com/zou3519/pytorch/tree/im2col): please feel free to pull from it.

Yes, the code is close to being ready to merge! There are a few changes I'd like to see (let me know if you don't want to continue with this, I can also make the changes if you don't have the bandwidth). They are as follows:
- Figure out the contiguous things I mentioned above in the review
- Add the documentation for fold
- Add module tests
